title: The little world, or, A liuely description of all the partes and properties of man for inuention wittie, for iudgement learned, and for practise necessarie / by Ro. Vn. ...
author: Underwood, Robert, fl. 1605.
publisher: Printed for W. Iones, and are to be solde at his shoppe neere Holborne conduit at the signe of the Gun,
